original: yaiḥ kāruṇyaparigrahānna gaṇitaḥ svārthaḥ parārtha prati /

analyzed: jagat jātam śūnyam tvayi tanaya loka antara gate
pakṣa utkṣipta ambunā athaḥ paṭutara javanaiḥ preryyamāṇaiḥ samīraiḥ
cañcvā sañcūrṇya śakra aśani dhanada gadā preta lokeśa daṇḍān

original: ājau nirjatya devān kṣaṇamamṛtamayīṃ vṛsṭimabhyutsṛjāmi // Nā_5.32 //
analyzed: ājau nirjatya devān kṣaṇam amṛta mayīm vṛsṭim abhyutsṛjāmi
uṣṇīṣaḥ sphuṭaḥ eṣa mūrdhani vibhāti ūrṇā iyam antar bhruvaḥ
ścakṣuḥ tāmarasa anukāri hariṇā vakṣaḥ sthalam spardhate

original: cakrāṅkau caraṇau tathāpi hi kathaṃ hā vatsa madūduṣkṛtai-
analyzed: cakra aṅkau caraṇau tathā api hi katham hā vatsa
s tvam vidyādhara cakravarti padavīm a prāpya viśrāmyasi
nijena jīvitena api jagatām upakāriṇaḥ
parituṣṭā asmi te vatsa
jīva jīmūtavāhana
abhilaṣita adhika vara de
praṇipatita jana ārtti hāriṇi śaraṇye
caraṇau namāmi aham te vidyāvara pūjite
gauri  /
samprāpta akhaṇḍa dehāḥ sphuṭa phaṇa maṇibhiḥ bhāsuraiḥ uttana aṅgaiḥ
r jihvā koṭi dvayena kṣitim amṛta rasa āsvāda lobhāt lihantaḥ
sampratyābaddha vegāḥ malaya giri sarit vāripūrāḥ iva amī
vakraiḥ prasthāna mārgeḥ viṣadhara patayaḥ toyarāśim viśanti
rutpannaiḥ mama mānasāt upanataiḥ toyaiḥ mahā pāvanaiḥ
sva icchā nirmita ratna kumbha nihitaiḥ eṣā abhiṣicya svayam

original: tvāṃ vidyādharacakravarttinamahaṃ prītyā karomi kṣaṇāt // Nā_5.37 //
analyzed: tvām vidyādhara cakravarttinam aham prītyā karomi kṣaṇāt
agresarībhavatu kāñcanakram etat eṣa dvipaḥ ca dhavalaḥ daśanaiḥ caturbhiḥ

original: śyāmo harirmalayavatyapi cetyamūni ratnāni te samavalokya cakravarttin / // Nā_5.38 //
analyzed: śyāmaḥ hariḥ malayavatī api ca iti amūni ratnāni te samavalokya cakravarttin
trātaḥ yam śaṅkhacūḍaḥ pataga pati mukhāt vainateyaḥ vinīta

original: stena prāgbhakṣitā ye viṣadharapatayo jīvitāste 'pi sarve /
analyzed: stena prāc bhakṣitāḥ ye viṣadhara patayaḥ jīvitāḥ te sarve
mad prāṇa āptyā vimuktāḥ na gurubhiḥ asavaḥ cakravartti tvam āptam
sākṣāt tvam devi

original: dṛṣṭā priyamaparamataḥ kiṃ punaḥ prārthyate yat // Nā_5.39 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭā priyam aparam atas kim punar prārthyate yat
vṛṣṭim hṛṣṭa śikhaṇḍa tāṇḍava bhṛtaḥ muñcantu kāle dhanāḥ
kurvantu pratirūḍha santata harit śasya uttarīyām kṣitim
cinvānāḥ sukṛtāni vīta vipadaḥ nirmansaraiḥ mānisaiḥ

original: rmodantāṃ satataṃ ca bāndhavasuhṛdgoṣṭhipramodāḥ prajāḥ // Nā_5.40 //
analyzed: rmodantām satatam ca bāndhava suhṛd goṣṭhi pramodāḥ prajāḥ
śivam astu sarva jagatām para hita niratāḥ bhavantu bhūta gaṇāḥ

original: doṣāḥ prayāntu nāśaṃ sarvatra sukhī bhavatu lokaḥ // Nā_5.41 //
analyzed: doṣāḥ prayāntu nāśam sarvatra sukhī bhavatu lokaḥ
iti pañcamaḥ ṅkaḥ
